name: Steve Angello
description: '''Steven Patrik Josefsson Fragogiannis''' ({{langx|el|Στέφεν Πάτρικ Γιόζεφσον Φραγκόγιαννης}}; born 22 November 1982), known professionally as '''Steve Angello''', is a Greek–Swedish DJ, record producer, remixer and record label owner. He is a member of [[Swedish House Mafia]], together with [[Axwell]] and [[Sebastian Ingrosso]].
